Hauptmenu.Text: Main menu: {{Username}} here you can see all functions of the bot. Under 'More Info' you will find the house rules and conditions you have agreed to.

Payed.True: your payment was confirmed by our system
Payed.False: your payment has not yet been confirmed by our system. Should this still be the case at the beginning of the LAN party please contact the organizers!

Spenden.Text:
You can donate something if you are satisfied with the planning and organization.

Just click on the button below and select the donation amount ;)

PushNotification.NewOrder: We are ordering food soon! Please choose what food you would like from that list {{EssenListe}}. Please order until {{Zeit}}. Webpanel Link

Regeln.Text: Please read the house rules carefully! The following rules must be strictly adhered to for the duration of the LAN, a violation of which may result in the discretion until exclusion from the LAN.

Regeln.0: 1: There is no exception to the strict smoking ban in the building, there are aerosols -> it is Forbidden! For smokers there is the possibility to smoke like last year in the courtyard with closed building door.
Regeln.1: 2: Here was the FFP2 mask regulation but I did not want to renumber whoever reads this contacts me and gets one Manner
Regeln.2: 3: EVERYONE clear AUTONOMOUSLY their dishes and garbage. (For a fee of 150‚Ç¨ you get your own VIP dishes and GEOs Dad clears your garbage and dishes.)
Regeln.3: 4: Remaining unused food in the residual waste. Pizzas have no place in their boxes in the cardboard boxes. Violation of this rule will result in a penalty fee of 150‚Ç¨. (PS: Yes this rule exists for good reason.)
Regeln.4: 5: Only walk through the building in appropriate clothing during office hours.
Regeln.5: 6: Keeping noise levels at an appropriate level during office hours.
Regeln.6: 7: With alcohol consumption a corresponding behavior is nevertheless to be expected. (GEOs attitude towards excessive alcohol consumption and its effects should be known by everyone)

Legal.Text: Please read the regulations carefully and agree to them!
Legal.Preisliste: The following taxes are obligatory to be paid by each guest and will be calculated automatically.

Legal.0: An electricity meter is provided for billing the electricity costs. The use of the meter is mandatory. The counter is not officially calibrated and has a tolerance of 1%
Legal.1: There are some general charges for the LAN these are listed below and serve to make this event without loss for GEO and his dad.
Legal.2: You have no problem with spontaneously having no network or getting a friendly RubberDucky in your PC. :D
